offerAndAcceptance.offer: The First Party offers to transfer money.
offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: The Second Party accepts the role of facilitating these transfers.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: Both parties agree to collaborate on financial transfers.

consideration.description: The consideration for this Agreement shall be the transfer of monetary funds between the parties.
consideration.value: Amounts are not specified in the contract.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Both parties intend to create a legally binding agreement.
contract.legalityOfPurpose: The purpose of this Agreement is for the transfer of funds for humanitarian activities.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: The subject matter of this Agreement shall be the transfer of money for humanitarian assistance.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: The timing for the performance of the obligations will be coordinated by the agreement of both parties.

contract.consent: Consent is implied through mutual agreements in this contract.

durationAndTermination.duration: This Agreement shall be valid for a period of ______ months commencing from the signature date.
durationAndTermination.terminationConditions: Either party may terminate this Agreement by providing two weeks written notice to the other party.
durationAndTermination.renewalTerms: Renewal terms are not specified in this contract.

disputeResolution.method: Seek a friendly resolution and consultation.
disputeResolution.details: If no resolution is reached, disputes will be taken to a mutually agreed mediator.
